detaileddescription.para: < variable to check initialization status MAX44009 initialization structure

briefdescription.para: Function responsible to configure Threshold interrupt conditions in the support layer.

parameterdescription.para: structure representing to Threshold interrupt configuration
MAX44009 sensor configure Threshold interrupt success.
MAX44009 sensor configure Threshold interrupt failed.
MAX44009 sensor configure Threshold interrupt failed because of invalid input parameter.

briefdescription.para: Function to Configure interrupts of Max44009. Before calling this API Update the below information in the appropriate structure 1) Update callback function in Max44009Utils_InfoPtr_T. 2) Update the type of callback(deferred or real time) in Max44009Utils_InfoPtr_T. After calling this API the given interrupt will be enabled and the callback will be associated with the interrupt.

parameterdescription.para: :Structure holding the information about interrupt related configuration should be given here
when this api is called before initializing Bma280 sensor.

simplesect.para: In case of other failures refer #MAX44009_setUpperThreshold or #MAX44009_setLowerThreshold or #MAX44009_setThresholdTimer or #MAX44009_setIntrptReg API's.
The return value consist of (First MSB Byte represents Package ID,Next Byte represents Severity and Last 2LSB Bytes represents error code).

briefdescription.para: Function to Disable the Interrupt.Max44009 sensor supports only Threshold Interrupt. So, calling this API will disable Max44009 Threshold interrupt explicitly.

parameterdescription.para: when this api is called before initializing Bma280 sensor.

simplesect.para: In case of other failures refer #MAX44009_setIntrptReg API.
The return value consist of (First MSB Byte represents Package ID,Next Byte represents Severity and Last 2LSB Bytes represents error code).

briefdescription.para: Function to initialize Max44009. This needs to be called before calling any other API.

parameterdescription.para: when any of the input parameter(max44009Info or max44009Info->ISRCallback) is NULL.

simplesect.para: In case of other failures refer BSP_SensorNode_Enable or #I2CSensorTransceiver_Init or #MAX44009_init or #MAX44009_setCdr or #MAX44009_setIntegrationTime or #MAX44009_setContinousModeReg API's.
1) The return value consist of (First MSB Byte represents Package ID,Next Byte represents Severity and Last 2LSB Bytes represents error code).
2) The support of multiple instances is not possible due to the limitation in the library.
3) Calling Max44009 initialization API present in sensorUtils (Max44009Utils_initialize) and sensorDriver (MAX09_init) concurrently will lead to unexpected behaviour.

briefdescription.para: Function to uninitialize Max44009.After calling this API sensor is no more usable without initializing it again by calling Max44009Utils_initialize() API.

parameterdescription.para: when this api is called before initializing Bma280 sensor.

simplesect.para: In case of other failures refer BSP_SensorNode_Disable or BSP_SensorNode_IsAllNodesDisabled or #I2CSensorTransceiver_Deinit API.
The return value consist of (First MSB Byte represents Package ID,Next Byte represents Severity and Last 2LSB Bytes represents error code).
